overview: Pierre Fitch. Jake Bass. Need we say more? Dubbed the "Sons of Montreal," both Jake and Pierre are dynamo performers that leave their partners asking for seconds and their fans wanting even more! What happens when we put these favorites together for the first time ever? #Matchupofthecentury. Joined by Colby Keller, Levi Michaels, Gabriel Clark, and Brandon Jones, this volume is filled with some of the most dynamic guys around. Enjoy!
tagline: Sons of Montreal together for the 1st time!
title: Double Trouble
